name: Monolith
text: OMG! The monolith lives! And it's getting guarded.

name: Lighthouse
text: The north-east lighthouse is emitting some weird fog or something.

name: Away
text: it's probably a good idea to stay away from the lighthouse

name: Food?
text: I think the tower is hungry? like it needs food or something...

name: Discovery
text: Found more voidsteel today. It has a funny smell though.

name: To Jack
text: Jack, I went to the hole with survivors. Find me ASAP! Love, Ann

name: To Anna
text: Anna, saw your note. Got attacked by a weird thing on the way. So sorry. Jack

name: From Anna
text: Jack, still inside the hole. Please come find me. Miss you! xx Anna

name: Sick Neighbour
text: Neighbour looked sick today. Hope he feels better tomorrow.

name: Weird Noises
text: Weird noises coming from the sick neighbour's house. He is not getting better.

name: Attack
text: he neighbour attacked someone today! Took 5 people to stop him.
